content: I'm trying to remember how to create a sub-list serve on the calling center, but I can't seem to find it. Am I missing it, or did that functionality go away?
You can't create a list serve - you can just reference an existing list serve as a secondary list serve for a given call
Did that change? I know I've done that in the past, and, for example, O&O has multiple list serves: http://www.hl7.org/Special/committees/orders/listserv.cfm
I think you have to contact HQ to get a new list serve
